name.baseName: Aluminum Recycling ; Recycled Aluminum Ingots ; Scrap Aluminum ; 2012
铝再生 ; 再生铝锭 ; 废铝 ; 2012年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The recycled aluminum ingots, derived from scrap aluminum, are intended for use in applications where primary aluminum would traditionally be used. Examples include construction materials, automotive parts, electronics, packaging, and household items. This recycled material contributes to sustainability in manufacturing processes by reducing the demand for virgin aluminum, which involves high energy consumption and associated emissions during production.
再生铝锭来源于废铝，其用途旨在替代原铝的传统应用领域。例如建筑材料、汽车零部件、电子产品、包装以及家用品等。这种回收材料通过减少对原生铝的需求，在制造过程中有助于实现可持续性，因为原生铝的生产涉及高能耗和相关排放。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The recycled aluminum ingots, derived from scrap aluminum, are intended for use in applications where primary aluminum would traditionally be used. Examples include construction materials, automotive parts, electronics, packaging, and household items. This recycled material contributes to sustainability in manufacturing processes by reducing the demand for virgin aluminum, which involves high energy consumption and associated emissions during production.
再生铝锭来源于废铝，其用途旨在替代原铝的传统应用领域。例如建筑材料、汽车零部件、电子产品、包装以及家用品等。这种回收材料通过减少对原生铝的需求，在制造过程中有助于实现可持续性，因为原生铝的生产涉及高能耗和相关排放。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA data should take into account that the data provided is specific to the year 2012 and applies to the geographical context of China. Methodological considerations should include the specific recycling processes involved in producing the recycled aluminum ingots, as these can influence the environmental impact assessment. When integrating this data into broader assessments or comparing with other datasets, users must ensure temporal, geographical, and technological consistency. Recycling and end-of-life scenarios for aluminum products should be considered in the context of technology applicability when using this dataset.
本LCA数据的用户应注意，提供的数据特定于2012年，并且适用于中国的地理背景。方法论方面的考量应包括生产再生铝锭所涉及的具体回收过程，因为这些可能会影响到环境影响评估。在将此数据整合到更广泛的评估中或与其他数据集进行比较时，用户必须确保时间、地理和技术上的一致性。使用这个数据集时，应在技术适用性的背景下考虑铝制品的回收和产品寿命终点情景。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
